content:
During the last day, the Russian army has inflicted 299 beats on 12 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region.

About thisreportedHead of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov.

The child and two men were killed as a result of hostile attacks on Zaporozhye. Another 29 people are injured. 10 private homes were destroyed, more than 400 were damaged.

A total of 20 missile strokescarried out in Zaporizhzhiaand Zaporizhzhya district.

In addition, two aircraft blows came across a robot and a small toct. 54 UAV attacked Guliaypole, Levadne, robot, small Tokmachka, Malynivka, Novoandriivka.

222 Artillery strikes were attached to the territory of Gulyaypol, Orikhov, Robovy, Novoandriivka, Malynivka, Little Tokmachka, Omelnik, Levadny, Willow and Red Dnieper.

There were 325 reports of destruction of residential buildings and infrastructure.
title: The occupiers have struck 12 settlements of Zaporizhzhya region
description: The head of Zaporizhzhya Ova Ivan Fedorov informed about it. Baby and two men died ...
author: Army Inform
